title: Jurors in Ghislaine Maxwell's sex trafficking trial enter fourth full day of deliberations
description: Jurors in Ghislaine Maxwell's federal sex trafficking trial were set to resume deliberations in New York on Tuesday, their fourth full day of deliberations in the high-profile case.

title: Taliban bans women from solo, long-distance road trips in Afghanistan
description: The Taliban have banned women from taking long-distance road trips in Afghanistan on their own, requiring that a male relative accompany them for any distance beyond 45 miles, according to a Taliban official speaking to CNN.

title: Do you have a cold, the flu or Covid-19? Experts explain how to tell the difference
14-year-old girl fatally shot by LAPD called US 'safest country in the world,' father says
description: Valentina Orellana-Peralta, the 14-year-old who was fatally shot by police in the dressing room of a Los Angeles store, had once assured her father the US was "the safest country in the world" and she dreamed of becoming an American citizen, he said Tuesday.

title: See what's inside time capsules found near Robert E. Lee statue
description: Two time capsules were found while workers took down a statue of Confederate Gen. Robert E. Lee in Virginia.

title: The nearly 17 feet of snow in California's Sierra Nevada is crushing records. It's still not enough
description: After months of extreme drought that triggered water shortages and stoked wildfires, heavy snow is falling in the Sierra Nevada -- enough to break decades-old records.

title: Elon Musk's SpaceX satellites catch heat in China over close calls with space station
description: Elon Musk's rocky year in China is ending on another sour note.

title: China: The US endangered our astronauts
description: China lashed out at Elon Mask stating that his SpaceX's Starlink satellites endangered Chinese astronauts by flying too close to China's space station on two occasions. China's foreign ministry spokesperson blamed the US as well, but the larger issue is how to manage growing traffic in space, says CNN's Ivan Watson.

title: Manuel Perez, former Editorial Director of CNN Digital, dies at 57
description: Manuel Perez found a new hobby after moving to north Georgia's Blue Ridge Mountains late in his life. He became an amateur landscaper, planting Japanese maples and other perennials in his yard while creating a moon garden where pale-hued flowers reflect moonlight.

title: Russian court shuts down prominent human rights group in another blow to civil society
description: Memorial International, a prominent human rights organization, said Tuesday that Russia's Supreme Court has ruled it must cease all its operations, in the latest blow to the country's shrinking civil society.

title: Delta turned flight around mid-air, saying China's new Covid rules are unworkable
What should I do if my flight has been canceled or delayed?
description: It's been a tough few days for some air travelers here at the Christmas rush.

title: Heartwarming video shows bald eagle hatching from its egg
description: Rare footage shows a bald eagle hatch. Watch the eaglet take in its surroundings for the first time.

title: Thousands of cranes killed by bird flu in 'worst blow to wildlife' in Israel's history
description: An outbreak of avian flu has killed more than 5,000 migratory cranes in Israel, prompting authorities to declare a popular nature reserve off-limits to visitors and warn of a possible egg shortage as poultry birds are culled as a precaution.

title: Deadly flooding in Brazil kills at least 20 and displaces thousands, leaving Covid-19 vaccines submerged
description: The death toll from floods and heavy rain, which has blighted the Brazilian state of Bahia since November, rose to 20 after flooding intensified over the weekend, causing two dams to burst and the displacement of an estimated 62,800 people, state officials say.

title: US and Russia to talk Ukraine and security issues next month
description: US and Russian officials have agreed to sit down for security talks on January 10, a spokesman for the National Security Council confirmed Tuesday.

title: Airplane crashes in San Diego County
description: An airplane has crashed in the El Cajon area of Southern California, authorities said.

title: Video shows physical altercation on flight
description: A woman onboard a Delta flight from Tampa to Atlanta was caught on video getting in a physical altercation with another passenger. CNN's Ryan Young has the details.

title: Soccer star Kylian Mbappe on what's in store for his future
description: The 2018 World Cup winner told Connect the World's Becky Anderson in Dubai on Monday that he is "100%" sure he will finish out the season with Paris Saint-Germain.

title: Los Angeles woman faces federal charge after allegedly punching another passenger on Delta flight
description: A Los Angeles woman is facing a federal assault charge after allegedly hitting and spitting on another passenger on a December 23 Delta flight from Tampa to Atlanta.

title: At least 4 killed in Denver shooting spree
description: A string of shootings across the Denver metro area left multiple people dead and a police officer injured, authorities said.

title: Kris Jenner bought her whole family electric cars for Christmas
description: You get a car! And you get a car!

title: 'I'm quite worried': Doctor reacts to new CDC guidance
description: Brown University's Associate Dean of Public Health Dr. Megan Ranney voices her concerns over the CDC's new guidance which recommends five days of isolating instead of 10 for people who have tested positive for Covid-19 but are asymptomatic.

title: January 6 committee eyes interim report by summer 2022
description: The House select committee investigating the January 6 Capitol Hill riot is working toward a goal of releasing an interim report with initial findings by the summer, a committee aide told CNN, and that a final report would follow in fall 2022.

title: Delta turned flight around mid-air, saying China's new Covid cleaning rules are unworkable
description: A Delta Air Lines flight originating in Seattle and heading to Shanghai last week turned around midair because of a change in cleaning rules at the China airport, the airline said.

title: 'We've seen lifelong friends kill each other:' How a state capital became one of the deadliest US cities
description: Around Thanksgiving, this crisis-plagued state capital saw a series of shootings that pushed the year's homicide total past 130, setting a grim annual record for a city that over the last two years has quietly become one of the country's deadliest.

title: 2021: The year when America's crumbling infrastructure finally got its due
description: Following decades of talk about failing infrastructure, the country finally took a major step toward repairing it in 2021, transportation experts say.

title: Hear from Gulag victim's descendant as Russia shuts down Memorial International
description: Russia's Supreme Court ordered the closure of Memorial International, a prominent human rights organization, in the latest blow to the country's shrinking civil society. CNN's Melissa Bell reports from Moscow.

title: Vipava Valley: Slovenia's beautiful hidden treasure
description: It's less than an hour's drive from Slovenia's capital, Ljubljana, yet the Vipava Valley hasn't really registered on the tourist radar.

title: A firebrand cleric will help decide the fate of the Iraqi prime minister
description: Iraq's Supreme Court has ratified the results of October's parliamentary election, dealing a blow to Iran-backed factions who have staged protests against the outcome of the vote.

title: You can't troll the President with 'Let's go, Brandon' and then play the victim
description: Jared Schmeck, a 35-year-old father in Oregon, essentially cursed at President Joe Biden during a livestreamed phone call on Christmas Eve and rightfully triggered a mini firestorm.

title: Miami Dolphins defeat New Orleans Saints to create a little piece of NFL history
description: The Miami Dolphins' hot streak continued to burn brightly with a comfortable 20-3 win against the New Orleans Saints at the Caesars Superdome on Monday Night Football.

title: The Russian and the American who went on a first date on Christmas Day
description: It was Christmas 2018, and Aleksei Kolodkin had just arrived in the US from his home in Russia.

title: Behold the balaclava: Why a 19th-century army accessory has taken over social media
description: Scroll through Instagram, TikTok or Pinterest this winter and you'll see thousands of youthful faces framed inside what looks like an overgrown knitted sock. The balaclava, sometimes called a ski mask, has become an unusual sartorial staple -- and a late entry in the race to claim 2021's hottest fashion trend.

title: Edinson Cavani salvages point for Man United at Newcastle
description: Substitute Edinson Cavani scored in the second half to help Manchester United salvage a 1-1 draw at struggling Newcastle United in the Premier League on Monday.

title: Debutant becomes instant cult hero with six-wicket Ashes haul
description: Test debutant Scott Boland etched his name in the record books and became an instant cult hero in Australian cricket with an astonishing six-wicket haul that wrapped up the Ashes on day three of the third test in Melbourne on Tuesday.

title: Times Square New Year's Eve ball gets new look
description: New crystals from Irish company Waterford have joined over 2,000 sparkling triangles covering the ball that drops over New York's Times Square every year, days before the countdown to 2022.

title: Japan and China agree to set up defense hotline amid territorial tensions
description: The defense ministers of Japan and China on Monday agreed to set up a joint communication hotline by the end of 2022, a news release from Japan's Defense Ministry said, amid tensions between the East Asian neighbors.

title: Drugs, violence and racism are leading to a spate of killings in shootouts in Marseille
description: The southern French port city of Marseille has made headlines in recent months over the deaths of several young people in drug-related shootouts, in what is often referred to as a "settling of scores."

title: Biden grapples with a Covid-19 testing failure that could have been foreseen
description: President Joe Biden and his team repeatedly promised more Covid-19 testing, including at-home kits that deliver rapid results, but they are now admitting a virus that is more adaptable than the politicians who fight it has outpaced them again.

title: 3,500-year-old mummy of Egyptian king 'digitally unwrapped'
description: CT scanning has revealed tantalizing details about the life and death of the pharaoh Amenhotep I for the first time since his mummified remains were discovered in 1881.

title: Victim of trucker sentenced to 110 years speaks out
description: Valerie Robertson Young, one of the survivors of a deadly 2019 crash in Colorado, does not believe a district court judge should lessen the 110-year sentence for Rogel Aguilera-Mederos, the truck driver who was convicted.

title: Thousands in Philippines left homeless and hungry at Christmas after super typhoon
description: Usually, Jay Lacia wakes at midnight on Christmas Day to start the festivities -- but this year, all he wished for was enough food to eat.

title: Police release videos from fatal shooting of 14-year-old girl in Los Angeles
description: The Los Angeles Police Department has released an edited package of surveillance camera footage and police-worn body camera videos showing the events that led to the shooting death of a teenage girl by an officer firing at an assault suspect.

title: 2 children killed and 4 others injured in hit-and-run, Florida authorities say
description: Two children were killed and four others were hospitalized Monday afternoon after a hit-and-run crash in Broward County, authorities in South Florida said.
